name: Highrise to Hell
description:
The city's being taken over by Hell, but your only job is to clean, so don't let that distract you! Clean as many windows as you can before you still ultimately succomb.

The Team

Programming - Luawei
Art - TheranTemere
Music/Sound - Grave Bear
Additional assistance - Oaktree

Made in one week for The Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2
